steps.description: Start Looking for a Gnomeregan group
Talk to Briarthorn, Fenthwick, Toldren Deepiron, Dink, or Brandur Ironhammer and train your class spells
Talk to Ginny Longberry and buy 3 Rune of Teleportations from her
Talk to Jubahl Corpseseeker and buy Grimoires for your Succubus or your Voidwalker
Talk to Harick Boulderdrum downstairs and buy a Pestilent Wand if it's better than your current wand
Talk to Sara Balloo and turn in Sully Balloo's Letter
Talk to Sara Balloo and accept Sara Balloo's Plea
Talk to King Magni Bronzebeard, turn in Sara Balloo's Plea and accept A King's Tribute
Talk to Grand Mason Marblesten, turn in A King's Tribute and accept A King's Tribute
Talk to Thalgus Thunderfist downstairs and buy a Heavy Quiver
Talk to Pilot Longbeard and accept The Brassbolts Brothers
Talk to Regnus Thundergranite or Bilban Tosslespanner and train your class spells
Talk to Belia Thundergranite and train your pet skills.

tips.text: Make sure you have Frost/Nature resistance maxed out on your pet

steps.description: Talk to Gnoarn, Tinkmaster Overspark, High Tinker Mekkatorque, Master Mechanic Castpipe and Klockmort Spannerspan and accept The Day After, turn in Tinkmaster Overspark, accept Save Techbot's Brain!, accept The Grand Betrayal, accept Data Rescue, and accept Essential Artificials
Talk to Innkeeper Firebrew and set your Hearthstone to Ironforge
Exit Ironforge
Talk to Ozzie Togglevolt and turn in The Day After and accept Gnogaine
Travel to Gnomeregan
Use the Empty Leaden Collection Phial on a Irradiated Invader or Irradiated Pillager.

tips.text: The Irradiated Invader or Irradiated Pillager must be ALIVE when you use it
This quest is completed while OUTSIDE of the dungeon

steps.description: Travel to Ozzie Togglevolt in Kharanos.

tips.text: You will get a follow up for when you go inside the dungeon

steps.description: Talk to Ozzie Togglevolt and turn in Gnogaine
Talk to Ozzie Togglevolt and accept The Only Cure is More Green Glow

quests.name: The Only Cure is More Green Glow

steps.description: Travel to Gnomeregan
Kill Troggs and Gnomes. Loot them for a White Punch Card. Kill Techbot. Loot him for his Memory Core.

tips.text: This quest is completed while OUTSIDE of the dungeon

steps.description: Kill Troggs and Gnomes. Loot them for a White Punch Card.

tips.text: This quest is completed while OUTSIDE of the dungeon

steps.description: Use the White Punch Card at the Matrix Punchograph 3005-A.

tips.text: This quest is completed while OUTSIDE of the dungeon

steps.description: Enter the Gnomeregan instance portal
Kill all Gnomeregan Mobs. Loot them for their Robo-mechanical Guts
Use the Yellow Punch Card at the Matrix Punchograph 3005-B.

tips.text: The console looking machine is located at the gnomish safe zone at the bottom floor, next to the big circular room where the slimes are located

steps.description: Talk to Kernobee and accept A Fine Mess.

tips.text: This will start an escort quest. Kernobee spawns randomly in The Dormitory, right outside of the gnomish safe zone

steps.description: Escort Kernobee back to the start of the dungeon
Use the Heavy Leaden Collection Phial on a Irradiated Slime, Irradiated Lurker or Irradiated Horror.

tips.text: The Irradiated Slime, Irradiated Lurker or Irradiated Horror must be ALIVE when you use it
You must turn this quest in within 2 hours of acquiring the High Potency Radioactive Fallout

quests.name: The Only Cure is More Green Glow

steps.description: Open the Artificial Extrapolators. Loot them for Essential Artificials
Use the Blue Punch Card at the Matrix Punchograph 3005-C.

tips.text: The Punchograph is located on the suspended platform right next to the Electrocutioner 6000

steps.description: Use the Red Punch Card at the Matrix Punchograph 3005-D
Kill Mekgineer Thermaplugg
Open the Artificial Extrapolators. Loot them for Essential Artificials.

tips.text: If you still haven't finished this quest, go back to places where you looted them before, since they respawn after a few minutes

steps.description: Kill all Gnomeregan Mobs. Loot them for their Robo-mechanical Guts
Use the Grime-Encrusted Ring to start the quest and accept Grime-Encrusted Ring
Take the Grime-Encrusted Ring to The Sparklematic 5200 in The Clean Zone.

tips.text: You will have to back track to The Clean Zone near the instance entrance, make sure your teamates are there to help you on your trip back

steps.description: Click the The Sparklematic 5200 one more time and accept Return of the Ring
Hearth to Ironforge
Exit Ironforge
Talk to Ozzie Togglevolt and turn in The Only Cure is More Green Glow

quests.name: The Only Cure is More Green Glow

steps.description: Travel to Ironforge
Talk to Talvash del Kissel, turn in Return of the Ring and accept Gnome Improvement
Talk to Talvash del Kissel and turn in Gnome Improvement.

tips.text: If you are able to obtain a Silver Bar and a Moss Agate finish this quest. If not, abandon it

steps.description: Talk to Tinkmaster Overspark, High Tinker Mekkatorque, Master Mechanic Castpipe and Klockmort Spannerspan and turn in Save Techbot's Brain!, The Grand Betrayal, Data Rescue and Essential Artificials
Talk to Bailey Stonemantle and withdraw Skeleton Finger and Vial of Spider Venom from your bank if you have any
Talk to Bailey Stonemantle and deposit Crate of Crash Helmets and Elixir of Water Breathing into your bank
Enter the Deeprun Tram. Take the tram to Stormwind. Level your First Aid if needed while waiting for the tram

tips.text: Level your First Aid if needed while waiting for the tram

steps.description: Teleport to Stormwind
Talk to Collin Mauren and turn in Retrieval for Mauren
Talk to Shoni the Shilent and turn in Gyrodrillmatic Excavationators
Talk to Grimand Elmore, turn in Blessed Arm and accept Armed and Ready
Talk to Archbishop Benedictus and turn in Cleansing the Eye
Talk to Thomas and accept The Missing Diplomat. Thomas walks around through the Cathedral

tips.text: Thomas walks around through the Cathedral

steps.description: Click the Sealed Crate on the ground and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Talk to Collin Mauren and turn in Retrieval for Mauren
Talk to Elling Trias up stairs, turn in Look to an Old Friend and accept Infiltrating the Castle
Travel to the Stormwind Keep
Talk to Tyrion, turn in Infiltrating the Castle and accept Items of Some Consequence
Talk to Bishop DeLavey, turn in The Missing Diplomat and accept The Missing Diplomat
Talk to Jorgen, turn in The Missing Diplomat and accept The Missing Diplomat
Exit Stormwind. Travel to Clara's Farm House in Elwynn Forest
Loot Clara's Fresh Apples on the table. If you still need Silk Cloth buy some from the Auction House

tips.text: If you still need Silk Cloth buy some from the Auction House

steps.description: Talk to Elling Trias, turn in The Missing Diplomat and accept The Missing Diplomat
Travel to the Stormwind Keep
Talk to Tyrion, turn in Items of Some Consequence and accept The Attack!

tips.text: Ensure your party has all turned in Items of Some Consequence before you accept The Attack!
Automatic quest accept has been turned off for this step. Note you may not be able to accept the quest if someone else is in the process of doing it

steps.description: Kill Lord Gregor Lescovar and Marzon the Silent Blade

tips.text: Wait in the center of the courtyard for Lord Gregor Lescovar and Marzon the Silent Blade to arrive. This takes roughly 2 minutes

steps.description: Talk to Elling Trias up stairs, turn in The Attack! and accept The Head of the Beast
Enter the SI:7 Headquarters. Travel up stairs toward Master Mathias Shaw
Talk to Master Mathias Shaw, turn in The Head of the Beast and accept Brotherhood's End
Talk to Baros Alexston, turn in Brotherhood's End and accept An Audience with the King
Travel to the Stormwind Keep
Talk to Lady Katrana Prestor and turn in An Audience with the King
Talk to Auctioneer Jaxon and buy a Bronze Tube from the Auction House. Skip this step if you aren't able to get one

tips.text: Skip this step if you aren't able to get one

steps.description: Talk to Auctioneer Jaxon and buy 7 Jungle Remedy from the Auction House for a quest later in Stranglethorn Vale.

tips.text: This is optional, you may also farm them from the mobs later
You may want to buy extra for yourself to use as it cures diseases and removes poisons

steps.description: Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Duskwood
Talk to Herble Baubbletump and buy a Bronze Tube.

tips.text: This is a limited supply item. Skip this step if Herble Baubbletump doesn't have one

steps.description: Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras, accept Look To The Stars and turn in Look To The Stars.

tips.text: Skip this step if you haven't found a bronze tube

steps.description: Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras and accept Look To The Stars
Head south towards the chapel. Talk to Blind Mary, turn in Look To The Stars and accept Look To The Stars
Kill the Insane Ghoul. Loot him for Mary's Looking Glass.

tips.text: The Insane Ghoul may be inside of the chapel or walking around outside

steps.description: Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras and turn in Look To The Stars
Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras and accept Look To The Stars
Talk to Calor and accept Worgen in the Woods
Talk to Commander Althea Ebonlocke and accept The Night Watch
Talk to Innkeeper Trelayne and set your Hearthstone to Darkshire
Talk to Tavernkeep Smitts and accept Juice Delivery
Talk to Watcher Backus, turn in The Missing Diplomat and accept The Missing Diplomat
Kill Nightbane Shadow Weavers
Talk to Calor, turn in Worgen in the Woods and accept Worgen in the Woods
Kill Nightbane Dark Runners.

tips.text: Nightbane Dark Runners move very fast and have a larger than normal agro radius

steps.description: Travel to the Eastvale Logging Camp
Talk to Marshal Haggard, turn in The Legend of Stalvan and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Head upstairs in the House. Open Marshal Haggard's Chest. Loot it for A Faded Journal Page
Talk to Marshal Haggard, turn in The Legend of Stalvan and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Travel towards Abercrombie in Duskwood
Talk to Abercrombie, turn in Juice Delivery and accept Ghoulish Effigy
Kill Plague Spreaders. Loot them for their Ribs and Fangs.

tips.text: Other Ghouls may also drop Ribs and Fangs but focus on Plague Spreaders

steps.description: Talk to Abercrombie, turn in Ghoulish Effigy and accept Ogre Thieves
Talk to Sven Yorgen, turn in Return to Sven and accept Proving Your Worth
Kill Skeletal Raiders, Skeletal Healers and Skeletal Warders.

tips.text: Enter the Dawning Wood Catacombs for the Skeletal Warders
Mor'Ladim a level 35 Elite patrols around the cemetery. Be cautious of him

steps.description: Talk to Sven Yorgen, turn in Proving Your Worth and accept Seeking Wisdom
Open the Defias Strongbox. Loot it for the Defias Docket
Loot Abercrombie's Crate on the ground
Enter the Vul'Gol Ogre Cave
Kill Zzarc' Vul. Loot him for his Monocle. Zzarc' Vul has 2 spawn points inside the Cave

tips.text: Zzarc' Vul has 2 spawn points inside the Cave

steps.description: Head south to Stranglethorn Vale
Look out for Private Thorsen's RP event while you quest. Guard him from the mobs that attack him, and accept his quest.

tips.text: He patrols down the road down the Rebel Camp every ~30 minutes

steps.description: Talk to Barnil Stonepot, accept Welcome to the Jungle and talk to Hemet Nesingwary and turn in Welcome to the Jungle
Talk to Ajeck Rouack and accept Tiger Mastery. Talk to Sir S. J. Erlgadin and accept Panther Mastery
Kill Young Panthers
Kill Young Tigers
Talk to Ajeck Rouack and Sir S. J. Erlgadin, turn in Tiger Mastery and accept Tiger Mastery, turn in Panther Mastery
Head back to Duskwood
Kill Black Widow Hatchlings and Carrion Recluses. Loot them for their Spider Venom
Kill Skeletal Fiends and Skeletal Horrors. Loot them for their Fingers
Kill Black Widow Hatchlings and Carrion Recluses. Loot them for their Spider Venom
Talk to Abercrombie, turn in Ogre Thieves and accept Note to the Mayor
Click A Weathered Grave and accept The Weathered Grave
Talk to Sven Yorgen and turn in Armed and Ready
Talk to Sven Yorgen and accept Morbent Fel
Cast Teleport: Moonglade
Teleport to Moonglade. Talk to Loganaar and train your class spells
Hearth back to Darkshire. Buy food/water if needed
Talk to Innkeeper Trelayne and buy food/water. You'll need at least 2 1/2 stacks for the upcoming segment

tips.text: You'll need at least 2 1/2 stacks for the upcoming segment

steps.description: Talk to Tavernkeep Smitts, turn in The Legend of Stalvan and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Talk to Commander Althea Ebonlocke, turn in The Night Watch and The Legend of Stalvan, and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Talk to Clerk Daltry, turn in The Legend of Stalvan and accept The Legend of Stalvan
Talk to Sirra Von'Indi, turn in The Weathered Grave and accept Morgan Ladimore
Talk to Lord Ello Ebonlocke, turn in Note to the Mayor and accept Translate Abercrombie's Note
Talk to Sirra Von'Indi, turn in Translate Abercrombie's Note, accept Wait for Sirra to Finish, turn in Wait for Sirra to Finish, and accept Translation to Ello
Talk to Lord Ello Ebonlocke and turn in Translation to Ello
Talk to Lord Ello Ebonlocke and accept Bride of the Embalmer
Talk to Commander Althea Ebonlocke, turn in The Legend of Stalvan and accept The Legend of Stalvan, turn in Morgan Ladimore and accept Mor'Ladim
Talk to Calor, turn in Worgen in the Woods and accept Worgen in the Woods
Talk to Avette Fellwood and stock up on Razor Arrows
Talk to Watcher Backus, turn in The Missing Diplomat and accept The Missing Diplomat
Loot the Tear of Tilloa on the ground
Kill Stalvan Mistmantle. Loot him for his Family Ring.

tips.text: Stalvan Mistmantle can hit quite hard. Kite him back to town and get help from the Watchers if needed

steps.description: Talk to Madame Eva, turn in The Legend of Stalvan and The Totem of Infliction
Talk to Viktori Prism'Antras and turn in Look To The Stars
Kill Nightbane Vile Fangs and Nightbane Tainted Ones.

tips.text: Be careful as all the mobs in the area respawn at once after a few minutes

steps.description: Kill Nightbane Worgens. Loot them for An Old History Book. Use An Old History Book to start the quest and accept An Old History Book
Grind until you are anywhere between level 31 & 75% and level 32.

tips.text: Kill Nightbane Worgens until your Hearthstone cooldown is <25 minutes

steps.description: Grind until you are anywhere between 31 & 85% and 32.

tips.text: Kill Nightbane Worgens until your Hearthstone cooldown is <25 minutes

steps.description: Click Eliza's Grave Dirt to summon Eliza. Kill Eliza. Loot her for the Embalmer's Heart.

tips.text: Eliza will cast Frostbolt and Frost Nova along with summoning multiple Guards
You can avoid dealing with Eliza's Guards by using the Wagon to jump on top of Abercrombie's Hut
You can avoid dealing with Eliza's Guards by using the Wagon to jump on top of Abercrombie's Hut
You can avoid dealing with Eliza's Guards by using the Wagon to jump on top of Abercrombie's Hut
You can avoid dealing with Eliza's Guards by using the Wagon to jump on top of Abercrombie's Hut
You can evade Eliza's Guards by using the Wagon to jump on top of Abercrombie's Hut. Eliza will continue to cast Frostbolt at you if you do this while she's alive
You can evade Eliza's Guards by using the Wagon to jump on top of Abercrombie's Hut. Eliza will continue to cast Frostbolt at you if you do this while she's alive
You can evade Eliza's Guards by using the Wagon to jump on top of Abercrombie's Hut. Eliza will continue to cast Frostbolt at you if you do this while she's alive
You can evade Eliza's Guards by using the Wagon to jump on top of Abercrombie's Hut. Eliza will continue to cast Frostbolt at you if you do this while she's alive

steps.description: Clear your way to the 2nd floor of the house. Equip Morbent's Bane in your off-hand.

tips.text: Use Morbent's Bane on Morbent Fel to weaken him
Remember to equip your weapon/off-hand slot after weakening him

steps.description: Kill Morbent Fel.

tips.text: This quest can be difficult. You may skip this step and come back at a higher level if you wish

steps.description: Talk to Sven Yorgen and turn in Morbent Fel
Kill Mor'Ladim. Loot him for his Skull.

tips.text: Mor'Ladim hits very hard but moves quite slow. Try to kite him around any large trees if required
This quest can be difficult. You may skip this step and come back at a higher level if you wish

steps.description: Grind mobs in the area to 29640+/58600xp
Grind mobs in the area to 24240+/58600xp
Talk to Thor and fly to Duskwood. Go to Sentinel Hill in Westfall
Travel to Stranglethorn Vale
Keep an eye out for the special Private Thorsen event. Kill both of Kurzen's Agents and then accept Private Thorsen's quest which becomes available after saving him

tips.text: Keep an eye out for the special Private Thorsen event. He will patrol down the road from the Rebel camp every 30 minutes
Private Thorsen will be attacked by 2 of Kurzen's Agents. If you don't see this event, ignore this step

steps.description: Talk to Barnil Stonepot and Hemet Nesingwary, accept Welcome to the Jungle and turn in Welcome to the Jungle
Talk to Ajeck Rouack and Sir S. J. Erlgadin and accept Tiger Mastery and Panther Mastery
Kill Young Panthers
Kill Young Stranglethorn Tigers
Kill Young Panthers
Talk to Ajeck Rouack and Sir S. J. Erlgadin, turn in Tiger Mastery and Panther Mastery. Don't accept the follow ups yet

tips.text: Don't accept the follow ups yet

steps.description: Grind to 32
Talk to Lieutenant Doren and turn in Jungle Secrets. Don't accept the follow up yet

tips.text: Don't accept the follow up yet

steps.description: Cast Teleport: Moonglade
Teleport to Moonglade. Talk to Loganaar and train your class spells
Hearth to Darkshire. Buy food/water if needed
Travel to Darkshire
Talk to Commander Althea Ebonlocke and turn in Mor'Ladim
Talk to Commander Althea Ebonlocke and accept The Daughter Who Lived
Talk to Lord Ello Ebonlocke and turn in Bride of the Embalmer
Talk to Watcher Ladimore and turn in The Daughter Who Lived and accept A Daughter's Love. Watcher Ladimore patrols around in Darkshire

tips.text: Watcher Ladimore patrols around in Darkshire

steps.description: Talk to Calor, turn in Worgen in the Woods and accept Worgen in the Woods
Talk to Jonathan Carevin and turn in Worgen in the Woods
Talk to Felicia Maline and fly to Westfall
Click A Weathered Grave and turn in A Daughter's Love
Talk to Thor and fly to Stormwind
Talk to Felicia Maline and fly to Stormwind
Teleport to Stormwind City
Talk to Jennea and train your class spells
Teleport to Stormwind
Train your class spells
Talk to Archmage Malin and accept Malin's Request
Talk to Connor Rivers and accept James Hyal
Talk to Newton Burnside and withdraw Musquash Root from your bank
Talk to Auctioneer Jaxon and buy 4 Lesser Bloodstone Ore to complete an optional quest coming up in Stranglethorn Vale.

tips.text: Skip this step if you cannot aquire them

steps.description: Go into The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Zardeth of the Black Claw, turn in A Noble Brew and accept A Noble Brew
Talk to Auctioneer Jaxon and buy 4 Lesser Bloodstone Ore to complete an optional quest coming up in Stranglethorn Vale.

tips.text: Skip this step if you cannot aquire them

steps.description: Talk to Newton Burnside and withdraw Musquash Root from your bank
Talk to Elling Trias, turn in The Missing Diplomat and accept The Missing Diplomat
Talk to Wu or Ilsa and train your class spells
Talk to Wu Shen and accept The Islander
Talk to Osborne and train your class spells
Talk to Dashel Stonefist, turn in The Missing Diplomat and accept The Missing Diplomat.

tips.text: Dashel Stonefist will become hostile after accepting the follow up quest. Defeat him

steps.description: Defeat Dashel Stonefist.

tips.text: Dashel Stonefist will also attack with 2 Old Town Thugs. Ignore them and focus on Dashel Stonefist

steps.description: Talk to Dashel Stonefist, turn in The Missing Diplomat and accept The Missing Diplomat
Talk to Elling Trias, turn in The Missing Diplomat and accept The Missing Diplomat
Talk to Archmage Malin and accept Malin's Request
Talk to Connor Rivers and accept James Hyal
Go into The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Zardeth of the Black Claw, turn in A Noble Brew and accept A Noble Brew
Talk to Ursula Deline and train your class spells
Talk to Gakin the Darkbinder and accept Seeking Strahad
Talk to Demisette Cloyce and accept In Search of Menara Voidrender.

tips.text: Skip this step if you picked up the same quest from Ironforge earlier

steps.description: Talk to Bishop Farthing, turn in Seeking Wisdom and accept The Doomed Fleet
Travel to the Stormwind Cathedral
Talk to Arthur the Faithful and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Joshua and train your class spells
Talk to Lord Baurles K. Wishock and turn in A Noble Brew
Talk to Milton Sheaf and turn in An Old History Book
Talk to Milton Sheaf and accept Southshore
Teleport back to the Stormwind Trainer and Train your level 34 class spells if you didn't earlier
Go into The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Zardeth of the Black Claw and Zggi, accept You Have Served Us Well and turn in You Have Served Us Well
Talk to Einris Brightspear and train your class spells
Enter the Deeprun Tram. Take the Tram to Ironforge.

tips.text: Level your First Aid if needed while waiting for the Tram
Do a logout skip inside the Tram. Click here for video reference

steps.description: Teleport to Ironforge
Talk to Gryth Thurden and fly to Wetlands
Talk to Glorin Steelbrow, turn in The Doomed Fleet and accept Lightforge Iron
Click the Waterlogged Chest, turn in Lightforge Iron and accept The Lost Ingots
Kill Bluegill Raiders. Loot them for Ingots
Talk to Glorin Steelbrow, turn in The Lost Ingots and accept Blessed Arm
Talk to Shellei Brondir or Gryth Thurden and fly to Southshore
